Name: waymar royce
Sentence: What do you expect? They're savages. One lot steals a goat from another lot and before you know it, they're ripping each other to pieces.

Name: will
Sentence: I've never seen wildlings do a thing like this. I've never seen a thing like this, not ever in my life.

Name: waymar royce
Sentence: How close did you get?

Name: will
Sentence: Close as any man would.

Name: gared
Sentence: We should head back to the wall.

Name: royce
Sentence: Do the dead frighten you?

Name: gared
Sentence: Our orders were to track the wildlings. We tracked them. They won't trouble us no more.

Name: royce
Sentence: You don't think he'll ask us how they died? Get back on your horse.

Name: will
Sentence: Whatever did it to them could do it to us. They even killed the children.

Name: royce
Sentence: It's a good thing we're not children. You want to run away south, run away. Of course, they will behead you as a deserter … If I don't catch you first. Get back on your horse. I won't say it again.

Name: royce
Sentence: Your dead men seem to have moved camp.

Name: will
Sentence: They were here.

Name: gared
Sentence: See where they went.

Name: royce
Sentence: What is it?

Name: gared
Sentence: It's …

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Go on. Father's watching.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: And your mother.

Name: septa mordane
Sentence: Fine work, as always. Well done.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Thank you.

Name: septa mordane
Sentence: I love the detail that you've managed to get in this corners. … Quite beautiful … the stitching …

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: And which one of you was a marksman at ten? Keep practicing, Bran. Go on.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Don't think too much, Bran.

Name: robb stark
Sentence: Relax your bow arm.

Name: jonrobb
Sentence: Quick, Bran, faster!

Name: cassel
Sentence: Lord Stark. My lady. A guardsman just rode in from the hills. They've captured a deserter from the Night's Watch.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Get the lads to saddle their horses.

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: Do you have to?

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: He swore an oath, Cat.

Name: cassel
Sentence: The law is law, my lady.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Tell Bran he's coming, too.

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: Ned. Ten is too young to see such things.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: He won't be a boy forever. And winter is coming.

Name: robb stark
Sentence: Lad, go run back and get the rest.

Name: will
Sentence: White Walkers. I saw the White Walkers. White Walkers. The White Walkers, I saw them.

Name: will
Sentence: I know I broke my oath. And I know I'm a deserter. I should have gone back to the Wall and warned them. But I saw what I saw. I saw the White Walkers. People need to know. If you can get word to my family, tell them I'm no coward. Tell them I'm sorry.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: nods yes, and WILL is positioned on the tree limb that serves as a block.

Name: will
Sentence: Forgive me, lord.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: In the name of Robert of the House Baratheon, first of his name …

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Don't look away.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: King of the Andals and the First Men …

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Father will know if you do.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and protector of the realm, I, Eddard of the House Stark, Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North, sentence you to die.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You did well.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: You understand why I did it?

Name: bran stark
Sentence: Jon said he was a deserter.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: But do you understand why I had to kill him?

Name: bran stark
Sentence: Our way is the old way?

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: The man who passes the sentence should swing the sword.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: Is it true he saw the White Walkers?

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: The White Walkers have been gone for thousands of years.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: So he was lying?

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: A madman sees what he sees.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: What is it?

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: Mountain lion?

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: There are no mountain lions in these woods.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: It's a freak.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: It's a direwolf.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Tough old beast.

Name: robb stark
Sentence: There are no direwolves south of the Wall.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Now there are five.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You want to hold it?

Name: bran stark
Sentence: Where will they go? Their mother's dead.

Name: cassel
Sentence: They don't belong down here.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Better a quick death. They won't last without their mother.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: Right. Give it here.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: NO!

Name: robb stark
Sentence: Put away your blade.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: I take orders from your father, not you.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: Please, father!

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: I'm sorry, Bran.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Lord Stark? There are five pups. One for each of the Stark children. The direwolf is the sigil of your House. They were meant to have them.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: You will train them yourselves. You will feed them yourselves. And if they die, you will bury them yourselves.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: What about you?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I'm not a Stark. Get on.

Name: robb stark
Sentence: What is it?

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: The runt of the litter. That one's yours, Snow.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: As your brother, I feel it's my duty to warn you

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: And you never worry about anything. When we were seven, you jumped off the cliffs as Casterly Rock. One hundred foot drop into the water. And you were never afraid.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: There was nothing to be afraid of until you told father. [In a whisper, mimicking] We're Lannisters. Lannisters don't act like fools.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: What if Jon Arryn told someone?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: But who would he tell?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: My husband.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: If he told the king, both our heads would be skewered on the city gates by now. Whatever Jon Arryn knew or didn't know, it died with him. And Robert will choose a new Hand of the king, someone to do his job while he's off fucking boars and hunting whores. Or is it the other way around? And life will go on.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You should be the Hand of the king.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: That's an honor I can do without. Their days are too long, their lives are too short.

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: All these years and I still feel like an outsider when I come here.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: You have five northern children. You're not an outsider.

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: I wonder if the old gods agree.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: It's your gods with all the rules.

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: I am so sorry, my love.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Tell me.

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: There was a raven from Kings Landing. Jon Arryn is dead. A fever took him. I know he was like a father to you.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Your sister. The boy …

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: They both have their health. Gods be good. [pause] The raven brought more news. The king rides for Winterfell. With the queen and all the rest of them.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: He's coming this far North, there's only one thing he's after.

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: You can always say no, Ned.

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: We need plenty of candles for Lord Tyrion's chamber. I'm told he reads all night.

Name: maester luwin
Sentence: I'm told he drinks all night.

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: How much could he possibly drink? A man of his … stature.

Name: luwin
Sentence: We've brought up eight barrels of ale from the cellar. Perhaps we'll find out.
